document.full_text: maria riesch regained the overall world cup lead from rival lindsey vonn with one race to go on friday after beating the reigning champion in a slalom.
document.title: maria riesch regains world cup lead from lindsey vonn
lines_and_colors: maria riesch regained the overall world cup lead from rival lindsey vonn with one race to go on friday after beating the reigning champion in a slalom.
